title: White Cheddar Stuffed Mushrooms
directions: Start with Jumbo mushroom caps, grill them for couple minutes.

Mix together milk, wine, Worcestershire sauce, mustard, pepper, mayo, and cheese in the top of a 2-quart double boiler over simmering water. Cook, stirring occasionally, about 20 minutes or until cheese is melted and the mixture is hot.

Put the white fondue cheese sauce on the bottom of the dish. Stuff the mushrooms with the herb cheese, top that with the panko breadcrumbs that have been mixed with the Parmesan, top off with provolone cheese and broil until melted.
